New Records: Aaron Jones is the second-highest scorer in the tournament with 130 runs from two innings at a strike rate of nearly 197.
Jasprit Bumrah has an average of 4 and an economy rate of 2.85 after picking up five wickets for 20 runs in seven overs this tournament.
Key Match Events: India won the match by 7 wickets (with 10 balls remaining).
This is the first cricket match between India and the USA across any format.
Pre-Game Insights: The match is significant as both teams are undefeated with two wins each, giving the USA a chance to progress to the Super Eights.
Cricket is gaining popularity in the USA, influenced by Indian cricket's growing presence through investments in the IPL and mentions in the LA Olympics.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York pitch has settled enough, making the scary up-and-down bounce a thing of the past.
The match highlights the cultural significance of cricket in the USA, with mentions of connections between USA and India players.
Others: The match was played in New York, USA, on June 12, 2024.
